name: The Dungeons of Castle Madness
description: Rise to the challenge of overthrowing a power mad tyrant in this innovative action dungeon crawler RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core 2GHz Intel or 2.8GHz AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon X1600 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or better (256 MB graphics memory or more.) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i7 4790 3.6GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or better Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
